snippet: TRILLING--Charles, 93, husband of 67 years to wife Lillian, father of daughters Helen and Deborah, son Mark, son-in-law Barry, and grandchildren Ariel, Talia, and Isaiah, passed away at home in Tarzana, CA, on May 25, 2016. He will be remembered for his wit, charisma, prodigious memory, humility and kindness. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TRILLING--Charles, 93, husband of 67 years to wife Lillian, father of daughters Helen and Deborah, son Mark, son-in-law Barry, and grandchildren Ariel, Talia, and Isaiah, passed away at home in Tarzana, CA, on May 25, 2016. He will be remembered for his wit, charisma, prodigious memory, humility and kindness. 1/3
